name: directorist-gutenberg/listing-card-user-avatar
title: Listing User Avatar
description: Displays the user avatar field of the listing

alignment.description: Alignment is used to set the alignment of the block

block_width.description: Block width is used to set the width of the block in percentage

avatar_overlap.description: The avatar overlap feature positions the avatar partially over the preceding block's content. When enabled, the avatar overlaps the top of the previous block by 50% of its height, creating a visually layered effect
